Package com.heretere.hdl.relocation.classloader

Class IsolatedClassLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
java.security.SecureClassLoader
java.net.URLClassLoader
com.heretere.hdl.relocation.classloader.IsolatedClassLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public final class IsolatedClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
This class handles loading some dependencies that are needed for loading other dependencies, but not need afterwards.
